name: Eoscene
overview:
Eoscene provides compliance data management, automation and reporting solutions that help Healthcare providers manage their Environment of Care.

Eoscene’s software makes it easy for health care providers to automate the planning, execution and reporting of Joint Commission and DOH compliance activities. Eoscene customers improve the management of processes, reduce operating costs, increase internal controls, and have better insight into risk management and compliance status of their organization.

Eoscene’s survey management, asset inspection and risk assessment tools enable health care providers to be continuously assured they are in fact compliant to policies and regulations. Eoscene’s AssureTemp automated temperature monitoring solution meets the stringent compliance requirements set forth by regulatory agencies such as The Joint Commission, CDC & DOH for manual temperature logs and automated temperature data collection.
